# hv_vcpu_set_sme_za_reg(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Sets the value of the vCPU ZA matrix register in streaming Scalable Vector Extension (SVE) mode.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vcpu_set_sme_za_reg(_ vcpu: hv_vcpu_t, _ value: UnsafePointer<UInt8>, _ length: Int) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **vcpu**: The ID of the vCPU instance.
- **value**: A pointer to the register value to set.
- **length**: The length of the provided ZA register value, in bytes.

## Return Value

`HV_SUCCESS` on success, an error code otherwise.

## Discussion

This method returns an error if `PSTATE.ZA` is `0` (for example, if [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vcpu_sme_state_t/za_storage_enabled] is `false`), or if the value `length` isn’t the range of [maximum of `SVL` bytes * maximum `SVL` bytes].

This methods doesn’t require streaming SVE mode to be in an enabled state.
